alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 23 at 6:38AM PST until January 23 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 7000 feet. New snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches for elevations above 7,000 feet. * WHERE...Elevations above 7,000 feet in the Sheep Range and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...Through 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Chains or snow tires are required for Kyle Canyon, Lee Canyon and on Deer Creek roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of dense fog may result in limited visibility and dangerous driving conditions. Utilize extra caution when driving.
info.instruction: If you must travel into the Spring Mountains, make sure you have chains or snow tires, winter clothing, extra food and water in your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
